name: Bullet Time²
description:
(Made in 1 week for Brackeys game jam 2020.2 - Allow some time to load, may take a while on slower connections) A game where your only bullet is rewound back in time to come back towards you. Can you escape the secret testing facility?

WASD to move, your player will look towards the mouse, LMB to shoot, your bullet will gravitate towards your mouse and curver around the screen, and after a short period of time follow the path it took back towards you. Make sure to face the bullet when it comes back to you as if it hits you from behind or the sides you will take damage.
